original_text: If the woman did not do those wrong things, you must not punish her husband. But if the woman did do those wrong things, you must punish her.’
korean_text: 남편은 무죄할 것이요 여인은 죄가 있으면 당하리라

sentences.original_text: If the woman did not do those wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그 여자가 그 잘못된 일들을 하지 않았다면

sentences.original_text: you must not punish her husband
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그녀의 남편을 벌주어서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: But if the woman did do those wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만일 그 여자가 그 잘못된 일들을 했다면
